channel.title: Welcome to El Camino College's Computing Club! 🧑‍💻 on
channel.description: Recent content in Welcome to El Camino College's Computing Club! 🧑‍💻 on

item.title: Resources 📚
item.description:
Opportunities list #

A list of internships and job opportunities! This is updated with new opportunities every week.

Outside events list #

A list of events many club members plan to attend. Many are online-based, but some are in-person. For example, in October, many club members attended Cerebral Beach Hacks, a Hackathon that was hosted in Santa Monica.

item.title: About
item.description:
The Computing Club is a tech club at El Camino College!

Our mission is to promote all aspects of computing through events and meetings, create an inclusive space for sharing ideas and experiences, and help develop skills that will help members succeed in their technical careers.

If you’re a student at El Camino College feel free to attend! See our Engage Page and Discord server for more information.

item.title: Events 🎂
item.description:
Besides regular meetings, the club has several special events coming up!

AWS Deep Racer competition (November 15th) #

Date & Time: Friday, November 15th, 2024 from 12-4PM

Computing Club and Robotics Club are hosting an AWS Deep Racer event. This is a beginner friendly competition that introduces machine learning and reinforcement learning concepts, which are prominent in many generative AI applications today. You’ll have the opportunity to see your ML model training come to life by racing an RC car on a miniature race track.

item.title: First Post
item.description: Welcome! This is the first post of our blog.
